metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23803 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: This affects the package latte/latte before 2.10.6. There is a way tobypass allowFunctions that will affect the security of the application.When the template is set to allow/disallow the use of certain functions,adding control characters (x00-x08) after the function will bypass theserestrictions.

criterions.comment: php-nette: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
